required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessing Effectiveness of Adalimumab for Treating Ulcerative Colitis in Real Life Conditions
clinical_study.official_title: Assessing Effectiveness of Adalimumab for Treating Ulcerative Colitis in Real Life Conditions

brief_summary.textblock: This study assesses the long‐term effectiveness of adalimumab in subjects starting a treatment for ulcerative colitis in real life conditions, namely to describe the time to loss of clinical benefit in a time to event approach.

primary_outcome.measure: Time to loss of clinical benefit
primary_outcome.description: Loss of clinical benefit will be defined as one of the following: loss of efficacy leading to adalimumab discontinuation or introduction/reinforcement of aminosalicylates, 6-mercaptopurine, or azathioprine, introduction or reinforcement of corticosteroids (any route), UC-related surgery, discontinuation of adalimumab due to adverse event, death.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline (Month 0) in Clinical Response
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical response is decrease in partial Mayo score >= 3 points and >= 30% from baseline plus a decrease in rectal bleeding subscore >= 1 or an absolute rectal bleeding subscore <= 1.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline (Month 0) in Clinical Remission
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical remission is defined as partial Mayo score <= 2 with no subscore >1

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline (Month 0) in Steroid-free remission
secondary_outcome.description: Steroid- free remission is defined as partial Mayo score <= 2 with no subscore >1 and no daily intake of prednisone.

arm_group.description: Subjects starting/ receiving Adalimumab for UC

study_pop.textblock: Subjects starting/ receiving Adalimumab for UC

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Suffering from ulcerative colitis
- Naïve from Adalimumab
- Starting a treatment with adalimumab
- Capable of and willing to grant authorization for use/disclosure of data collected
- Able to read, understand, and complete patients questionnaires
Exclusion Criteria:
